Html:
a strange thing happens:
i have an arcane/frost build that differs from the rawr standard one only for 2 point moved from magic attunement to magic absorption.
The dps i see in comparison chart for my current build is always the same as standard rawr arcane/frost (as i expected to) except for some strange situation where it's 2 or 3 point lower.
I can't find a reason for this...

This is a gear that gives me the same dps:

Head    Cowl of Tirisfal
Neck    Guardian's Pendant of Subjugation
Shoulders    Mantle of Tirisfal
Shirt    Orange Martial Shirt
Chest    Tormented Demonsoul Robes
Waist    Belt of Blasting
Legs    Leggings of Tirisfal
